annotations.description: We were witnesses to an uneventful game without many stirring moments. There is definitely room for improvement in future games. It was an even match on the whole, with both sides enjoying spells in the ascendancy. The hosts tried to catch the opposition off guard and hit them on the break. The visiting side kept the ball at their feet and the main intention was to produce that final killer pass.
